title: The Villain Loves Me Very Much - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Arrogant Characters   BDSM   Black Belly   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Cute Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Misunderstandings   Mysterious Past   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Sadistic Characters   Saving the World   Selfish Protagonist   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   Twisted Personality   Unreliable Narrator   World Hopping
author: 兔淼淼
description:
In order to save the worlds that was destroyed by the villains, Bai Yu transmigrated through various planes, just to let the villains feel the warmth of this world, reluctant to think about it, and indulge in it.

Domineering President: Never try to escape from my grasp again!

Black-bellied Bamboo Horse: Dear, you are mine alone…

Gao Leng Xueba: You can’t do this kind of subject, do you want me to teach you after class?

Bai Yu lay comfortably in the man’s arms, smiling evilly. So, who is trapping who?>
